info.question: You have to develop an Orders processing system. The system needs to store the Product Information which contains the image for every product. Which of the following implementation steps should be used when storing the Product related data. Choose 2 answers from the options given below
answers: Store the Product ID, Name and price in a DynamoDB table
Store the Product Image as an attribute in the same table
Store the Product ID, Name and price in an S3 bucket
Store the Product Image in an S3 bucket
correctAnswer: Store the Product ID, Name and price in a DynamoDB table
Store the Product Image in an S3 bucket

info.question: Your team is planning on delivering content to users by using the CloudFront service and an S3 bucket as the source. You need to ensure that a custom value is placed for the amount of time the object is stored in the CloudFront cache. which 2 of the following options can be used to fulfill this requirement?
answers: Configure the origin to add an Expires header field to the object
Configure the Cloudfront distribution to add an Expires header field to the object
Specify a value for Minimum TTL in CloudFront cache behaviors
Specify a value for Minimum TTL in the origin object
correctAnswer: Configure the origin to add an Expires header field to the object
Specify a value for Minimum TTL in CloudFront cache behaviors

info.question: You are using a custom tool known as POSTMAN to make API requests to resources in AWS. Part of the job of sending requests is to sign the request. Which of the following would you use to sign the API requests made to AWS?
answers: Your user name and password
A private key file
KMS keys
Access Keys
correctAnswer: Access Keys

info.question: A company is making use of the Simple Notification service to send notifications to various subscribers for their service. There is a user requirement for the subscriber to only receive certain types of messages and not all messages published to the topic. How can you achieve this?
answers: By adding a filter policy to the topic subscription
By adding an IAM policy to the topic
Publish the messages to an SQS queue
Publish the messages to a Lambda function
correctAnswer: By adding a filter policy to the topic subscription

info.question: Your company has an existing Redshift cluster. The sales team currently store historical data in the cluster. There is now a requirement to ensure that all data is encrypted at rest. How can you achieve this?
answers: Enable the Encryption feature for the cluster
Enable encryption for the underlying EBS volumes
Use SSL certificates to encrypt the data at rest
Create a new cluster with encryption enabled
correctAnswer: Create a new cluster with encryption enabled

info.question: Your team has developed a web application that will run on an EC2 Instance. There is a deployment requirement wherein if the primary application fails, the requests need to be routed to a static web site. Which of the following can help you achieve this?
answers: A Classic Load balancer placed in front of the EC2 Instances
An Application Load balancer placed in front of the EC2 Instances
A health check in Route 53
The swap URL feature in Elastic Beanstalk
correctAnswer: A health check in Route 53

info.question: Your team has decided to host a static web site using the Simple Storage Service. A bucket has been defined with the domain name, the objects uploaded, and the static web site hosting enabled for the bucket. But you are still not able to able to access the web site. Which of the following could be the underlying issue?
answers: You need to enable versioning for the bucket as well
The bucket must have public read access
You need to ensure the storage class is infrequent access
You need to use AWS Managed Keys
correctAnswer: The bucket must have public read access

info.question: As a developer you are looking at making use of AWS Cognito Sync. Which of the below are features of this service. Choose 3 answers from the options given below.
answers: Cross-device syncing of application-related user data
Synching of offline data back to AWS
Push Sync Notification
Sync data with DynamoDB
correctAnswer: Cross-device syncing of application-related user data
Synching of offline data back to AWS
Push Sync Notification

info.question: You have developed an application that is going to be hosted on an EC2 Instance. The company has decided to use Cloudfront to distribute the content. The IT Security department has mandated that the traffic is encrypted between Cloudfront and the Viewer and Cloudfront and the origin as well. How can you achieve this? Choose 2 answers from the options given below.
answers: Ensure that HTTP is mapped to port 443 at the origin
Ensure that KMS keys are used to encrypt the traffic
Ensure that the Viewer Protocol policy is set to HTTPS only or Redirect HTTP to HTTPS
Ensure that the Origin Protocol policy is set to HTTPS only
correctAnswer: Ensure that the Viewer Protocol policy is set to HTTPS only or Redirect HTTP to HTTPS
Ensure that the Origin Protocol policy is set to HTTPS only

info.question: Your application is currently configured to interact with an S3 bucket. Now you are getting errors that the bucket does not exist. Which of the following is the best way to understand how the bucket was deleted?
answers: Use the Cloudwatch logs to see the Bucket Deletion API request
Use the Cloudtrail logs to see the Bucket Deletion API request
Use the AWS Inspector service to see the Bucket Deletion API request
Use the AWS Trusted Advisor service to see the Bucket Deletion API request
correctAnswer: Use the Cloudtrail logs to see the Bucket Deletion API request

info.question: Your team is developing an application which makes use of Docker containers. These containers will be deployed to the Elastic Container Service. The applications on these containers need to interact with DynamoDB tables. Which of the following is the most secure way to ensure the containers can interact with DynamoDB?
answers: Create an IAM Role for the ECS Tasks
Embed the Access Keys in the containers
Embed the Access Keys in the cluster
Use an IAM users credentials to spin up the cluster
correctAnswer: Create an IAM Role for the ECS Tasks

info.question: An application is making calls to a DynamoDB table. The queries are taking on a lot of read capacity. The table has a large number of attributes. Not all of the attributes are used in the query. Which of the following can be used to minimize the read capacity being used by the queries?
answers: Use global secondary indexes with projected attributes
Use an Application Load balancer in front of the DynamoDB table
Consider using parallel scans on the table
Use a cloudfront distribution in front of the DynamoDB table
correctAnswer: Use global secondary indexes with projected attributes

info.question: Your team is developing a set of Lambda functions. You need to ensure the team uses the best practices for working with AWS Lambda. What is the advantage of initializing any external dependencies of your Lambda function code? Choose one of the options given below.
answers: Ability to decode errors better
Ability to instantiate an object for each invocation
Ability to reuse Execution Context
Ability to call functions faster
correctAnswer: Ability to reuse Execution Context

info.question: Your team is transitioning a stateful based web application to AWS. You need to decide the services which will be used to host the application. Which of the following would be included in the design? Choose 2 answers from the options given below
answers: DynamoDB to store the session data
AWS Lambda to store the session data
An Application Load balancer to distribute traffic
An API gateway to distribute traffic
correctAnswer: DynamoDB to store the session data
An Application Load balancer to distribute traffic

info.question: An application includes an Autoscaling Group. It has been determined that the best way to scale the group is based on the number of concurrent users. How can you achieve this?
answers: Create a tag for the Group to contain the number of concurrent users
Create a custom metric for the number of concurrent users
Since concurrent user metrics are not available, base the scaling of the group on CPU percentage
Since concurrent user metrics are not available, base the scaling of the group on Memory percentage
correctAnswer: Create a custom metric for the number of concurrent users

info.question: You have an application storing objects in Amazon S3 bucket. Due to massive popularity, these objects are frequently accessed from S3 bucket. Which of the following can be used to enhance GET performance of these objects?
answers: Save objects in separate buckets in each region.
Use Amazon CloudFront in front of S3 bucket.
Increase number of prefixes in S3 bucket.
Add random suffix to key names
correctAnswer: Use Amazon CloudFront in front of S3 bucket.

info.question: Your company has a SOAP service that receives requests in XML. The service is going to be placed behind the API gateway service. Which of the following must be done to ensure that requests made to the API gateway service can be consumed by the SOAP service?
answers: Create a mapping template
Setup a gateway response
Enable support for binary workloads
Setup Private integrations
correctAnswer: Create a mapping template

info.question: An application needs to make use of the SQS service for sending and receiving messages. The application takes 60 seconds to process a message. Assuming that a queue has been created with the default settings, which one of the following must be implemented?
answers: Call the ChangeMessageVisibility API and increase the timeout. Call the GenerateDataKey API for encryption of data. Call the DeleteMessage API to delete the message
Call the DeleteMessage API to increase the timeout.
Call the ChangeMessageVisibility API and decrease the timeout. Call the DeleteMessage API to delete the message.
Call the DeleteMessage API to delete the message from the queue first. Call the ChangeMessageVisibility API and increase the timeout
correctAnswer: Call the ChangeMessageVisibility API and increase the timeout. Call the GenerateDataKey API for encryption of data. Call the DeleteMessage API to delete the message

info.question: As a programmer you have been hired to develop an application for a company. The application needs to first encrypt the data at the client side before sending it to a destination location. How can you achieve this? The size of the data is generally around 1 to 4 MB. Each object needs to have its own key to encrypt the data.
answers: Upload the data to KMS and use the CMK key to encrypt the data
Use the CMK key ARN to get the key and encrypt the data
Use the GenerateDataKey API to get the key from a CMK
Upload the data to an S3 bucket with encryption enabled
correctAnswer: Use the GenerateDataKey API to get the key from a CMK

info.question: As a developer, you have the requirement to access resources in another account. Which of the following is the best way to achieve this?
answers: Create a cross account role and call the AssumeRole API
Create a user in the destination account and share the password
Create a user in the destination account and share the Access Keys
Create an IAM Role and attach it to an EC2 Instance
correctAnswer: Create a cross account role and call the AssumeRole API

info.question: You are a developer for an application. The application needs to make use of AWS for managing authentication. The users should be able to authenticate using identity providers such as Facebook and Google. At the same time, you also need to enable guest user access to limited resources. How can you achieve this in the best possible way?
answers: Use IAM users and groups
Use AWS Cognito and identity pools with both authenticated and unauthenticated identities
Use AWS federated identities
Use AWS Cognito App Sync
correctAnswer: Use AWS Cognito and identity pools with both authenticated and unauthenticated identities

info.question: You are currently working on a function for AWS Lambda. When uploading the package for your AWS Lambda function, you are receiving the following error CodeStorageExceededException. What can you do to resolve this error? Choose 2 options
answers: Raise a call with AWS Support to raise the limit on storage
Change the code to Node.js for taking up less storage
Reduce the size for your code
Change the memory limit
correctAnswer: Reduce the size for your code
Raise a call with AWS Support to raise the limit on storage

info.question: Your team is developing a series of Lambda functions. You need to ensure that you analyse the invocations of the functions during the testing phase. Which of the following tools can help you achieve this? Choose 2 answers from the options given below.
answers: Amazon Cloudwatch
Amazon Inspector
Amazon X-Ray
Amazon Cloudtrail
correctAnswer: Amazon Cloudwatch
Amazon X-Ray

info.question: Your company needs to develop an application that needs to have a caching facility in place. The application cannot afford many cache failures and should be highly available. Which of the following would you choose for this purpose?
answers: Use Memcached on an EC2 Instance
Use ElastiCache Memcached
Use ElastiCache Redis in Cluster Mode
Use Redis on an EC2 Instance
correctAnswer: Use ElastiCache Redis in Cluster Mode

info.question: Your team is developing a set of Lambda functions. They need to debug the Lambda functions using the X-Ray service. Which of the following are environment variables which are used by AWS Lambda to communicate with the X-Ray service? Choose 3 answers from the options given below
answers: _X_AMZN_TRACE_ID
AWS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING
AWS_XRAY_DAEMON_ADDRESS
AWS_LAMBDA_XRAY
correctAnswer: _X_AMZN_TRACE_ID
AWS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING
AWS_XRAY_DAEMON_ADDRESS

info.question: Your team is planning on deploying an application that processes periodic tasks using the worker environment on AWS Elastic Beanstalk. Which of the following is an additional requirement for a worker environment in AWS Elastic Beanstalk?
answers: Ensure that the application is uploaded as a zip file
Ensure that the application size does not exceed 512 MB
Ensure that the application does not include a parent level folder
Ensure that the application contains a file called cron.yaml
correctAnswer: Ensure that the application contains a file called cron.yaml

info.question: Your team is planning on using the AWS Code Build service to test out the build of the application. The application needs to connect to a database. How should you store the database password in a secure manner so that it is available during the build process?
answers: Store the password as an environment variable on the build server
Store the password in AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store
Store the password in a config file on the build server
Store the password in a config file in the application
correctAnswer: Store the password in AWS Systems Manager Parameter Store

info.question: Your team has just started using the API gateway service. Several AWS Lambda functions are used as the backend for the gateway service. You have deployed the API and made it available for test users. You have now made a change to the method response for the API gateway. What should you do next?
answers: Recreate the gateway service
Redeploy the API
Redeploy the Lambda function
Make a copy of the gateway API
correctAnswer: Redeploy the API

info.question: You are working on a REST API where you require to pass client submitted method requests as it is to a Lambda Function. Which of the following can be set as Integration type for this requirement?
answers: type: aws_proxy
type: aws
type: http_proxy
type: mock
correctAnswer: type: aws_proxy

info.question: A company has an application that is making use of a DynamoDB table. There is now a requirement to ensure that all changes to the items in the table are recorded and stored in a MySQL database. Which of the following would ideally be one of the implementation steps?
answers: Enable DynamoDB Accelerator
Enable DynamoDB global tables
Enable DynamoDB streams
Enable DynamoDB triggers
correctAnswer: Enable DynamoDB streams

info.question: You have developed a Lambda function. This function needs to run on a scheduled basis. Which of the following can be done to accomplish this requirement in an ideal manner?
answers: Use the schedule service in AWS Lambda
Use an EC2 Instance to schedule the Lambda invocation
Use Cloudwatch events to schedule the Lambda function
Use Cloudtrail to schedule the Lambda function
correctAnswer: Use Cloudwatch events to schedule the Lambda function

info.question: A company has a set of APIs and a web application. They want to deploy it to AWS. They do not want to manage the underlying infrastructure. Which of the following services can help to accomplish this?
answers: AWS Lambda and API Gateway
AWS EC2 and Cloudfront
AWS Lambda and Cloudfront
AWS Lambda and EC2
correctAnswer: AWS Lambda and API Gateway
